Operations

Operations
Save valuable time by automating bulk compliance processing.
Compliance
Reduce risk by aligning regulations, policies, and handbooks.
Auditors & finance

Auditors & finance
Avoid unnecessary costs with clear, traceable audit trails.
State of the art security

Compliant with GDPR and in transit for ISO 27001 and SOC 2 Type I & II, ensuring the highest standards of privacy and security.
Trust center
What Hybridity offers that general AI tools don’t

Hybridity
General AI tools
Answer consistency
Ensures consistent, repeatable answers with systematic reasoning across all workflows.
Dynamic reasoning produces different answers to the same question.

Error reduction
Breaks problems into smaller sub-tasks, solving systematically to minimise errors.
Prone to hallucinations and incorrect answers.
End-to-end automation

Automates entire workflows, reducing the need for human oversight.
Requires manual interaction for every step in a process.
Bulk workload handling

Processes thousands of documents simultaneously, saving significant time.
Handles one document or query at a time.
Traceability and verification

Provides document-level references and full audit trails for compliance workflows.
No references or audit trails for outputs.
Custom workflows

Custom workflows
Fully customisable workflows designed for your organisation’s policies and regulations.
Generic solutions that cannot adapt to specific business rules or needs.
Regulatory expertise

Purpose-built for regulations like Dora, EBA, GDPR, CSRD, KYC/AML, and many more.
Lacks specific knowledge of compliance frameworks or industry standards.
Collaboration vs working alone

Enables iterative collaboration, shared storage, and team-based workflow collaboration.
No shared workflows, storage, or team collaboration.
Two ways to get started
Either select a pre-mapped regulation from our library to quickly begin compliance checks on your files, or opt for guided assistance to map new regulations, verify them, and assess your own policies
your own policies and handbooks for compliance.

Select modules in our pre-populated library.
Map out your regulations and policies in the workspace for verification.
